page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER ON WHALSAY
page.content: On{Whalsay}there is only one policeman.In recent times there have not been any robberies,murders etc.The only crime he has to deal with is drunk drivers,probably the average age is 19. They go round the isle at about 50mph on very narrow roads . So far nobody has been killed,but plenty of cars have been destroyed. An elderly couple had just bought a new Renault 5 and two drivers who were drunk and doing 50mph crashed into the couple who were doing 30mph.The two drunks weren't wearing seat belts,but if the couple in the Renault hadn't been wearing seat belts they would have been killed.
